news.title: Abortion arrest: Recording reveals police concern
news.summary: Police “not comfortable” operating in abortion criminalisation, says Met officer in case of Nicola Packer.

news.title: King prepares to give key speech backing Canada
news.summary: King Charles has received a warm welcome in Canada ahead of a historic speech in its parliament.

news.title: Churchill photo thief sentenced to two years in jail
news.summary: 'The Roaring Lion' - one of the 20th century's most iconic images - was stolen from a hotel in Ottawa.

news.title: Streeting urges doctors to vote no in strike ballot
news.summary: Resident doctors unhappy with 5.4% pay rise with union warning strikes in England could return.

news.title: Iran's Palme d'Or-winning director cheered as he arrives home
news.summary: Director Jafar Panahi returns to Iran after his Cannes Film Festival win, greeted by cheers and applause.

news.title: Chinese-owned Volvo Cars to cut 3,000 jobs
news.summary: The firm's boss pointed to the "challenging period" faced by the industry as a reason for the layoffs.

news.title: Battle begins over new homes approved in historic village without sewage capacity
news.summary: Charity launches legal challenge as it says problem of over-capacity sewage works near new homes is "rife".

news.title: The Papers: Liverpool 'glory' descends into 'horror'
news.summary: The aftermath of a car ploughing into crowds at the Liverpool FC victory parade dominates Tuesday's papers.
